channel.title: Official Cream
channel.description:
Reasserting Liverpool’s dominance as the home of many a musical genre, Cream burst onto the 90’s Northern clubbing scene with a swagger of sophisticated electro cool, making house music history and cementing the highly coveted swirl as figure head of the chosen clubbing phenomena of a generation.
Cream became a worldwide phenomenon, influencing the lives of thousands, if not millions of people with their electric blend of House and Trance, today they host 4 club events a year at their spiritual home of Nation in Liverpool, as well as taking their Creamfields festival around the world, to date Creamfields has been staged in the UK, Spain, Poland, Portugal, Argentina, Chile, Brazil, Russia, Turkey to name a few. And the jewel in the Cream crown is their weekly summer residency at Amnesia in Ibiza , which has gone on to become the biggest club night on the island. They have defined themselves as one of the most instantly recognisable brands both visually and musically…not bad for a small backstreet club in Liverpool .
This is the official podcast for Cream. Each episode is presented by Cream resident dj, Andy Mac.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Official Cream Podcast - presented by Andy Mac
channel.itunes:author: Official Cream
channel.itunes:summary:

And the jewel in the Cream crown is their weekly summer residency at Amnesia in Ibiza , which has gone on to become the biggest club night on the island. They have defined themselves as one of the most instantly recognisable brands both visually and musically…not bad for a small backstreet club in Liverpool .
This is the official podcast for Cream. Each episode is presented by Cream resident dj, Andy Mac.

item.title: Steve Aoki Creamfields Guest Mix
item.description: To whet your appetite for festival season, this months featured guest mix comes from the mighty Steve Aoki who makes his Creamfields UK debut this August Bank holiday weekend. Expect a lively performance from Aoki who is rather partial to some cake throwing – you have been warned! www.creamfields.com
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: To whet your appetite for festival season, this months featured guest mix comes from the mighty Steve Aoki who makes his Creamfields UK debut this August Bank holiday weekend. Expect a lively performance from Aoki who is rather partial to some cake throwing – you have been warned! www.creamfields.com

item.title: Gareth Emery - Cream Ibiza Resident Mix
item.description: Cream returns to Amnesia in Ibiza this summer to take over Thursday nights and features an array of exclusive performances from the likes of deadmau5, Paul van Dyk, Above & Beyond, Calvin Harris, Laidback Luke, Eddie Halliwell and Example. We also welcome Gareth Emery as exclusive resident who will be making his Cream Ibiza debut and is this months featured Cream Podcast artist! Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Official Cream

item.title: Above & Beyond Mix & Interview
item.description: Ahead of their Group Therapy Tour and to coincide with this months Creamfields and Cream Ibiza line up announcements - we talk to Above & Beyond and we welcome them as the focus of this months mix - Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: Ahead of their Group Therapy Tour and to coincide with this months Creamfields and Cream Ibiza line up announcements - we talk to Above & Beyond and we welcome them as the focus of this months mix - Enjoy!

item.title: Paul Oakenfold Mix
item.description: To celebrate his return to the Courtyard in March, this months exclusive guest mix comes from Cream's prodical son Paul Oakenfold! Enjoy
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: To celebrate his return to the Courtyard in March, this months exclusive guest mix comes from Cream's prodical son Paul Oakenfold! Enjoy

item.title: Paul van Dyk Recorded Live from Cream Ibiza
item.description: Enjoy this exclusive Paul Van Dyk guestmix to celebrate Creamfields weekend, recorded live from Cream Amnesia!
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: Enjoy this exclusive Paul Van Dyk guestmix to celebrate Creamfields weekend, recorded live from Cream Amnesia!

item.title: Benny Benassi Cream Ibiza Guest Mix
item.description:
This month’s podcast features news about Creams Ibiza which kicks off this month and the countdown begins for this years award winning Creamfields which will see Benny Benassi perform, check out his exclusive mix in this months podcast. 

For further info on all things Cream and Cream Ibiza listings go to: www.cream.co.uk / www.creamfields.com

item.title: Laidback Luke Guest Mix
item.description: Following an outstanding year which saw Cream come of age reaching 18 years young as well as celebrate an awesome year of sell out shows from its club events to Creamfields, this month we bring an exclusive mix from the unstoppable Laidback Luke.
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: Following an outstanding year which saw Cream come of age reaching 18 years young as well as celebrate an awesome year of sell out shows from its club events to Creamfields, this month we bring an exclusive mix from the unstoppable Laidback Luke.

item.title: Calvin Harris In The Mix
item.description: To celebrate Cream Boxing Night 2010 enjoy this special mix from headliner Calvin Harris.
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: To celebrate Cream Boxing Night 2010 enjoy this special mix from headliner Calvin Harris.

item.title: deadmau5 In The Mix
item.description: One of the biggest electro stars on the circuit at the moment is deadmau5, having smashed Creamfields and Cream Ibiza last year enjoy this special mix from the man himself.
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
item.itunes:summary: One of the biggest electro stars on the circuit at the moment is deadmau5, having smashed Creamfields and Cream Ibiza last year enjoy this special mix from the man himself.

item.title: Tiesto In The Mix
item.description: To celebrate another sell out year for Creamfields, we bring you this very special mix from Creamfields headliner Tiesto. See you all down the front!
item.dc:creator: Official Cream
